timeline.bodyText: We should re-use the graph metrics aggregator. Thoughts?
timeline.author: ktkrg

replies.bodyText: yeah, maybe we should not create a separate aggregator. I was thinking we might add a lot more RCA metrics in the future which will make the  RCA_RUNTIME_METRICS_AGGREGATOR looks quite messy.
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: Do we not want metrics around HotNode RCA?
timeline.author: ktkrg

+/**
+ * metrics added by each RCA vertex in RCA graph. All metrics under this category are
+ * RCA specific
+ */
+public enum RcaVerticesMetrics implements MeasurementSet {
